id: People Are Sharing The Embarrassing Things They Don't Know How To Do And It's So Real
paragraph:
"I only know how to tie my shoes using the bunny ears method."
        —Carlyja—shabb_ah—juggernaut96—desert_nole—_Sublime_—nerdassmathfuck—hug_the_pug23—axelcuda—UsernameDotJPEG—GardenLeaves—soverylucky—rabid-savage—MyStarlingClementine—dynamic_caste—anotherkeebler—mxmnull—Incaendia—bladel—ForgetMeNotRaeRae—Focal_Jet—OsKarMike1306—zerofoxgiven27—Pravis_Balua—chimneylightSome responses have been edited for clarity.BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
